backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented features including homepage layout, company information, product showcase, partner logos, Blinkit coming soon section, and contact information with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their purpose and functionality in the Zayora website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables with neutral grayscale palette (no orange theme applied at root level).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Zayora application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component composing the full page layout with hero, product showcase, partner logos, coming soon, and contact footer sections.
frontend/src/components/ComingSoonSectio: Orange gradient section announcing upcoming Blinkit partnership with clock icon, heading, description, and Blinkit logo display.
frontend/src/components/ContactFooter.ts: Footer component displaying Zayora brand info, founder name (Yash Jaiswal), contact details (phone: 9919031626, email: zayora11@gmail.com), quick links, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with orange gradient background featuring Zayora brand name, founder attribution (Yash Jaiswal), tagline, and CTA buttons for products and contact.
frontend/src/components/PartnerLogos.tsx: Partner logos section displaying YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, and MX Player logos in a responsive grid with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component with image, name, description, and feature list with checkmarks, styled with orange accents and hover effects.
Product showcase section rendering two ProductCard components for Bluetooth Earbuds and Smart Watch with descriptions and features in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing authenticated and anonymous backend actor instances using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks to interact with backend; currently empty as no backend functionality is needed for the static website.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark themes, color palette (orange-focused), and smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, custom orange palette, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Zayora website requirements including orange tech theme, product showcase for earbuds/smartwatches, partner logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player, Blinkit), contact info, and image asset specifications.
